EmailTemplate.description: Notifies RS customer that funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.name: RS Customer - 30% Funds Disbursed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Disbursal__c.Loan__c}'s Solar Loan funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
BlueWave has disbursed the first 30% of your Solar Loan to {!Opportunity.Partner_tag2__c}.
In order for {!Opportunity.Partner_tag2__c} to receive the next 60% disbursement, they will need to upload mechanical completion documentation. If you have any questions about your loan, feel free to contact us at 844.786.4100.
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
